question: 用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (酸性介质)。${\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - } + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } \rightarrow {\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2}$
用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (酸性介质)。${\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + {\mathrm{{NaBiO}}}_{3} \rightarrow {\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - } + {\mathrm{{Bi}}}^{3 + }$
用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (酸性介质)。${\mathrm{{Cr}}}^{3 + } + {\mathrm{{PbO}}}_{2} \rightarrow {\mathrm{{Cr}}}_{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{7}^{2 - } + {\mathrm{{Pb}}}^{2 + }$
用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (酸性介质)。${\mathrm{C}}_{3}{\mathrm{H}}_{8}\mathrm{O} + {\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - } \rightarrow {\mathrm{C}}_{3}{\mathrm{H}}_{6}{\mathrm{O}}_{2} + {\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + }$
answer: (4) $5{\mathrm{C}}_{3}{\mathrm{H}}_{8}\mathrm{O} + 4{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - } + {12}{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } = 5{\mathrm{C}}_{3}{\mathrm{H}}_{6}{\mathrm{O}}_{2} + 4{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + {11}{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}$

question: 用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (酸性介质)。${\mathrm{{HClO}}}_{3} + {\mathrm{P}}_{4} \rightarrow {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } + {\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{PO}}}_{4}$

用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (碱性介质)。
${\mathrm{{CrO}}}_{4}^{2 - } + {\mathrm{{HSnO}}}_{2}^{ - } \rightarrow {\mathrm{{CrO}}}_{2}^{ - } + {\mathrm{{HSnO}}}_{3}^{ - }$
用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (碱性介质)。${\mathrm{H}}_{2}{\mathrm{O}}_{2} + {\mathrm{{CrO}}}_{2}^{ - } \rightarrow {\mathrm{{CrO}}}_{4}^{2 - }$

用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (碱性介质)。$\mathrm{{CuS}} + {\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - } \rightarrow {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{3 - } + {\mathrm{S}}^{2 - } + {\mathrm{{NCO}}}^{ - }$
answer: (3) $2\mathrm{{CuS}} + 9{\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - } + 2{\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - } = 2{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{3 - } + 2{\mathrm{\;S}}^{2 - } + {\mathrm{{NCO}}}^{ - } + {\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}$

question: 用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (碱性介质)。${\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - } + {\mathrm{O}}_{2} \rightarrow {\mathrm{{CO}}}_{3}^{2 - } + {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}$
用离子电子法配平下列反应方程式 (碱性介质)。$\mathrm{{Al}} + {\mathrm{{NO}}}_{2}^{ - } \rightarrow {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Al}}{\left( \mathrm{{OH}}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{ - } + {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}$
answer: (5) $2\mathrm{{Al}} + {\mathrm{{NO}}}_{2}^{ - } + {\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - } + 5{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} = 2{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Al}}{\left( \mathrm{{OH}}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{ - } + {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}$

question:
在实验室中通常用下列反应制取氯气:

$$
{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2} + 4\mathrm{{HCl}} = {\mathrm{{MnCl}}}_{2} + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2} + 2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}
$$

试通过计算回答, 为什么必须使用浓盐酸?

已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2}/{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + }}\right) = {1.22}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2}/{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }}\right) = {1.36}\mathrm{\;V}$ 。
answer:
反应 ${\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2} + 4\mathrm{{HCl}} = {\mathrm{{MnCl}}}_{2} + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2} + 2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}$ 是由 ${\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2}$ 作氧化剂,氧化 $\mathrm{{HCl}}$ (aq) 完成的。

正极 $\;{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2} + 4{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + 2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}\;{E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } = {1.22}\mathrm{\;V}$

负极 $\;{\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2} + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = 2{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }$  $\mathrm{E}^{\Theta }_{-} = {1.36}\mathrm{\;V}$

所以在标准状态下, ${E}^{ \ominus } = {1.22}\mathrm{\;V} - {1.36}\mathrm{\;V} = - {0.14}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,为负值,反应不能自发进行。

正极反应的能斯特方程为

$$
{E}_{ + } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{4}
$$

负极反应的能斯特方程为

$$
{E}_{ - } = {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{1}{{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}
$$

当 ${E}_{ + } = {E}_{ - }$ 时,有

$$
{E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{4} = {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{1}{{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}
$$

在盐酸中

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) = c\left( {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }\right) = c\text{ (盐酸) }
$$

故有 ${1.22}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {\left\lbrack c\text{ (盐酸) }\right\rbrack }^{4} = {1.36}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{1}{{\left\lbrack c\text{ (盐酸) }\right\rbrack }^{2}}$

$$
c\text{(盐酸)} = {6.18}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

故只有用浓盐酸才能制 ${\mathrm{{Cl}}}_{2}$ ,而且需要加热,以保证反应速率足够快。

question:
某学生为测定 $\mathrm{{CuS}}$ 的溶度积常数,设计如下原电池: 正极为铜片,在 ${0.1}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }$

溶液中,再通入 ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S}$ 气体使之达到饱和; 负极为标准锌电极。测得电池电动势为 ${0.67}\mathrm{\;V}$ 。已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Zn}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Zn}}}\right) = - {0.76}\mathrm{\;V},{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S}$ 的 ${K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{1}}^{ \ominus } = {1.1} \times {10}^{-7}$ , ${K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{2}}^{ \ominus } = {1.3} \times {10}^{-{13}}$ 。试求 CuS 的溶度积常数。
answer:
设生成 $\mathrm{{CuS}}$ 沉淀后,正极溶液中 ${\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }$ 的浓度为 $x\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ 。

所组成电池为

$$
\left( -\right) \mathrm{{Zn}}\left| {{\mathrm{{Zn}}}^{2 + }\left( {1\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}\right) \parallel {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\left( {x\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}\right) }\right| \mathrm{{Cu}}\left( +\right)
$$

电池反应为

$$
{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + \mathrm{{Zn}} = \mathrm{{Cu}} + {\mathrm{{Zn}}}^{2 + }
$$

由

$$
E = {E}^{ \ominus } - \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{c\left( {\mathrm{{Zn}}}^{2 + }\right) }{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) }
$$

$$
{0.67}\mathrm{\;V} = \left\lbrack {{0.34}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.76}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) }\right\rbrack - \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{1}{x}
$$

得 $x = {2.7} \times {10}^{-{15}}, c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) = {2.7} \times {10}^{-{15}}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ 。

平衡时, ${\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }$ 的浓度很小, ${0.1}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }$ 几乎全部转化为 $\mathrm{{CuS}}$ :

$$
{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + {\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S} = \mathrm{{CuS}} \downarrow + 2{\mathrm{H}}^{ + }
$$

则溶液中 $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) = 2 \times {0.1}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3} = {0.2}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ 。

由 ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S} = 2{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{S}}^{2 - }\;{K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{1}}^{ \ominus } \cdot {K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{2}}^{ \ominus } = \frac{{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}c\left( {\mathrm{\;S}}^{2 - }\right) }{c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S}}\right) }$

得

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{\;S}}^{2 - }\right) = \frac{{K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{1}}^{ \ominus } \cdot {K}_{{\mathrm{a}}_{2}}^{ \ominus } \cdot c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S}}\right) }{{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}
$$

饱和溶液时 $c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{\;S}}\right) = {0.1}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{\;S}}^{2 - }\right) = \frac{{1.1} \times {10}^{-7} \times {1.3} \times {10}^{-{13}} \times {0.1}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}{{\left( {0.2}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}\right) }^{2}}
$$

$$
= {3.6} \times {10}^{-{20}}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

$$
{K}_{\mathrm{{sp}}}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{{CuS}}\right) = c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) c\left( {\mathrm{\;S}}^{2 - }\right)
$$

$$
= {2.7} \times {10}^{-{15}} \times {3.6} \times {10}^{-{20}}
$$

$$
= {9.7} \times {10}^{-{35}}
$$

question:
已知 ${\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4} + 2{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3} + {\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}\;{E}^{ \ominus } = {0.559}\mathrm{\;V};\;{\mathrm{I}}_{3}^{ - } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {31}^{ - }$ ${E}^{ \ominus } = {0.54}\mathrm{\;V}$ 。问:

（1）若溶液的 $\mathrm{{pH}} = 7$ ,反应向哪个方向自发进行?

（2）若溶液中 $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) = 6\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ ,反应向哪个方向自发进行?
answer:
${\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3} + {\mathrm{I}}_{3}^{ - } + {\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} \rightleftharpoons {\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4} + 3{\mathrm{I}}^{ - } + 2{\mathrm{H}}^{ + }$

(1) $\mathrm{{pH}} = 7$ 时, $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) = 1 \times {10}^{-7}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$

$$
E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}/{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}}\right) {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}{c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right) }
$$

$$
= {0.559}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {\left( 1 \times {10}^{-7}\right) }^{2}
$$

$$
= {0.146}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

由于 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{I}}_{2}/{\mathrm{I}}^{ - }}\right)$ 不随 $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right)$ 变化而改变,即 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{I}}_{2}/{\mathrm{I}}^{ - }}\right) > E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}/{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right)$ ,反应朝正反应方向进行。

（2）当 $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) = 6\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ 时

$$
E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}/{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}}\right) {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}{c\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right) }
$$

$$
= {0.559}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {6}^{2} = {0.605}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

由于 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{I}}_{2}/{\mathrm{I}}^{ - }}\right) < E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{4}/{\mathrm{H}}_{3}{\mathrm{{AsO}}}_{3}}\right)$ ,所以反应逆向自发进行。

question:
求下列电池电动势和电池反应的标准平衡常数:

$\left( -\right) \mathrm{{Cu}} \mid {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{2 + }\left( {{0.10}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}\right) ,{\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\left( {{1.0}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}\right) \parallel {\mathrm{{AgNO}}}_{3}({0.010}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot$

$\left. {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}\right) \mid \mathrm{{Ag}}\left( +\right)$

已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V},{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{4}\right\rbrack }^{2 + }$ 的 ${K}_{\text{稳 }}^{ \ominus } = {2.1} \times {10}^{13}$ 。
answer:
${E}_{ + } = {E}^{ \ominus } + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg c\left( {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\right)$

$$
= {0.80}\mathrm{\;V} + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg {0.010}
$$

$$
= {0.68}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

由

$$
{K}_{\text{稳 }}^{ \ominus } = \frac{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{4}^{2 + }}\right) }{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) \right\rbrack }^{4}}
$$

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) = \frac{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{4}^{2 + }}\right) }{{K}_{\text{总 }}^{ \ominus }{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) \right\rbrack }^{4}} = \frac{0.10}{{2.1} \times {10}^{13} \times {1.0}^{4}}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

$$
= {4.8} \times {10}^{-{15}}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

$$
{E}_{ - } = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \left( {{4.8} \times {10}^{-{15}}}\right) = - {0.082}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

电池电动势

$$
E = {0.68}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.082}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) = {0.76}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

标准电极电势:

$$
{E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
{E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {E}^{ \ominus }\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{Cu}}{\left( {\mathrm{{NH}}}_{3}\right) }_{4}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right\rbrack = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V} + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \frac{1}{{2.1} \times {10}^{13}}
$$

$$
= - {0.053}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

电池标准电动势 $\;{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } - {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.053}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) = {0.85}\mathrm{\;V}$

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{z{E}^{ \ominus }}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = \frac{2 \times {0.85}\mathrm{\;V}}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = {28.81}
$$

$$
{K}^{ \ominus } = {6.5} \times {10}^{28}
$$

question:
$28}\mathrm{\;K}$ 时,测得原电池

$$
\left( -\right) \mathrm{{Cu}} \mid {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\left( {{1.0} \times {10}^{-2}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}}\right) \parallel {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\left( {c}^{ \ominus }\right) \mid \mathrm{{Ag}}\left( +\right)
$$

的电动势 $E = {0.52}\mathrm{\;V}$ 。

（1）若已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,求 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right)$ ;

（2）求该原电池的标准电动势 ${E}_{\text{池 }}^{ \ominus }$ ;

（3）写出该原电池的电池反应,并计算其标准平衡常数 ${K}^{ \ominus }$ 。
answer:
(1) 由电池电动势 $E = {E}_{ + } - {E}_{ - }$ 得

$$
{E}_{ - } = {E}_{ + } - E = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.52}\mathrm{\;V} = {0.28}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

负极的电极反应为

$$
{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = \mathrm{{Cu}}
$$

其能斯特方程为

$$
{E}_{ - } = {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{z}\lg c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right)
$$

所以

$$
{E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ - } - \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{z}\lg c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right)
$$

$$
= {0.28}\mathrm{\;V} - \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg \left( {{1.0} \times {10}^{-2}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.34}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

（2）题中的已知条件为 ${E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,(1) 中已求出 ${E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,故

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } - {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.34}\mathrm{\;V} = {0.46}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

（3）电池反应为

$$
2{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + } + \mathrm{{Cu}} = 2\mathrm{{Ag}} + {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }
$$

由 ${E}^{ \ominus } = \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{z}\lg {K}^{ \ominus }$ ,得

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{z{E}^{ \ominus }}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}
$$

将 (2) 中求得的 ${E}^{ \ominus }$ 值代入其中,得

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{2 \times {0.46}\mathrm{\;V}}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = {15.6}
$$

$$
{K}^{ \ominus } = {4.0} \times {10}^{15}
$$

question: 已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) = {0.34}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }}\right) = {0.15}\mathrm{\;V},{K}_{\mathrm{{sp}}}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{{CuCl}}\right) = {1.72} \times {10}^{-7}$ 。通过计算求反应 ${\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + \mathrm{{Cu}} + 2{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } = 2\mathrm{{CuCl}}$ 能否自发进行,并求反应的标准平衡常数 ${K}^{ \ominus }$ 。
answer:
由元素电势图

得

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) = 2 \times {0.34}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.15}\mathrm{\;V} = {0.53}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

对于反应 ${\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + \mathrm{{Cu}} + 2{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } = 2\mathrm{{CuCl}}$

正极

$$
{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + } + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = \mathrm{{CuCl}}
$$

负极

$$
\mathrm{{Cu}} + {\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } = \mathrm{{CuCl}} + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - }
$$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{CuCl}}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }}\right) + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg \frac{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }\right) }{c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }\right) }
$$

$$
= {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }}\right) + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg \frac{1}{{K}_{\mathrm{{sp}}}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{{CuCl}}\right) }
$$

$$
= {0.15}\mathrm{\;V} + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg \frac{1}{{1.72} \times {10}^{-7}}
$$

$$
= {0.55}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {\mathrm{{CuCl}}/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg c\left( {\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }\right)
$$

$$
= {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right) + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg {K}_{\mathrm{{sp}}}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{{CuCl}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.53}\mathrm{\;V} + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg \left( {{1.72} \times {10}^{-7}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.13}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } - {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Cu}}}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{CuCl}}}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {\mathrm{{CuCl}}/\mathrm{{Cu}}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.55}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.13}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
= {0.42}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

${E}^{ \ominus } > 0$ ,反应向正反应方向进行。

由

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{z{E}^{ \ominus }}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = \frac{1 \times {0.42}\mathrm{\;V}}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = {7.12}
$$

$$
{K}^{ \ominus } = {1.3} \times {10}^{7}
$$

question:
将下列非氧化还原反应设计成两个半电池反应, 并利用标准电极电势表的数据, 求出 ${298}\mathrm{\;K}$ 时反应的标准平衡常数 ${K}^{ \ominus }$ 。

(1) ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} = {\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }$ ;
answer:
(1) 正极 $\;\frac{1}{4}{\mathrm{O}}_{2} + \frac{1}{2}{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - } \rightleftharpoons {\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }\;{E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } = {0.401}\mathrm{\;V}$

负极 $\;\frac{1}{4}{\mathrm{O}}_{2} + {\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - } \rightleftharpoons \frac{1}{2}{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}\;{E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {1.229}\mathrm{\;V}$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } - {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {0.401}\mathrm{\;V} - {1.229}\mathrm{\;V} = - {0.828}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{z{E}^{ \ominus }}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = \frac{1 \times \left( {-{0.828}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) }{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = - {14.0}
$$

故反应 ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} = {\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }$ 的 ${K}^{ \ominus } = {1.0} \times {10}^{-{14}}$ 。

question: 将下列非氧化还原反应设计成两个半电池反应, 并利用标准电极电势表的数据, 求出 ${298}\mathrm{\;K}$ 时反应的标准平衡常数 ${K}^{ \ominus }$ 。${\mathrm{{Pt}}}^{2 + } + 4{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } = {\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{PtCl}}}_{4}\right\rbrack }^{2 - }$ 。
answer:
(2) 正极 $\;{\mathrm{{Pt}}}^{2 + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } \rightleftharpoons \mathrm{{Pt}}\;{E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } = {1.18}\mathrm{\;V}$

负极 $\;{\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{PtCl}}}_{4}\right\rbrack }^{2 - } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } \rightleftharpoons \mathrm{{Pt}} + 4{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - }\;{E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {0.755}\mathrm{\;V}$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}_{ + }^{ \ominus } - {E}_{ - }^{ \ominus } = {1.18}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.755}\mathrm{\;V} = {0.425}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$$
\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{z{E}^{ \ominus }}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = \frac{2 \times {0.425}\mathrm{\;V}}{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}} = {14.41}
$$

故反应 ${\mathrm{{Pt}}}^{2 + } + 4{\mathrm{{Cl}}}^{ - } = {\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{PtCl}}}_{4}\right\rbrack }^{2 - }$ 的 ${K}^{ \ominus } = {2.57} \times {10}^{14}$ 。

question:
已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }}\right) = {1.25}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right) = {0.74}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,设计成下列三个标准电池:

(a) $\cdot \left( -\right) \mathrm{{Tl}}\left| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }\right| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }\left| \mathrm{{Tl}}\right| \left( +\right)$

(b) $\left( -\right) \mathrm{{Tl}}\left| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }\right| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + },{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + } \mid \mathrm{{Pt}}\left( +\right)$

(c) $\left( -\right) \mathrm{{Tl}}\left| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }\right| {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + },{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + } \mid \mathrm{{Pt}}\left( +\right)$

（1）请写出每一个电池的电池反应式;

（2）计算每一个电池的电动势和 ${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus }$ 。
answer:
(1) 三个电池的电池反应式完全相同:

${\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + } + 2\mathrm{{Tl}} = 3{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }$

（2）三个电池的电极反应式不同,则电池的电动势 ${E}^{ \ominus }$ 不同。

${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right) = 3 \times {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right) - 2 \times {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }}\right)$

$$
= 3 \times {0.74}\mathrm{\;V} - 2 \times {1.25}\mathrm{\;V} = - {0.28}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

(a) 电子转移数为 3

正极 ${\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + } + 3{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = \mathrm{{Tl}}$

负极 $\mathrm{{Tl}} = {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - }$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{a}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.74}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.28}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) = {1.02}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus } = - z{E}^{ \ominus }F = \left( {-3 \times {1.02} \times {96.5}}\right) \mathrm{{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1} = - {295.3}\mathrm{\;{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1}$

(b) 电子转移数为 2

正极 ${\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }$

负极 $\mathrm{{Tl}} = {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + } + {\mathrm{e}}^{ - }$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{b}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right)
$$

$$
= {1.25}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.28}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) = {1.53}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus } = - z{E}^{ \ominus }F = \left( {-2 \times {1.53} \times {96.5}}\right) \mathrm{{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1} = - {295.3}\mathrm{\;{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1}$

(c) 电子转移数为 6

正极 ${\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + } + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }$

负极 $\mathrm{{Tl}} = {\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + } + 3{\mathrm{e}}^{ - }$

${E}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{c}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{ + }}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Tl}}}^{3 + }/\mathrm{{Tl}}}\right)$

$$
= {1.25}\mathrm{\;V} - {0.74}\mathrm{\;V} = {0.51}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus } = - z{E}^{ \ominus }F = \left( {-6 \times {0.51} \times {96.5}}\right) \mathrm{{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1} = - {295.3}\mathrm{\;{kJ}} \cdot {\mathrm{{mol}}}^{-1}$

计算结果表明,三个电池反应的 ${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus }$ 相同。这是因为三个电池的反应式完全相同, $G$ 是状态函数,所以 ${\Delta }_{\mathrm{r}}{G}_{\mathrm{m}}^{ \ominus }$ 相同。

question:
在酸性条件下,将 ${\mathrm{{KMnO}}}_{4}$ 滴加到过量 $\mathrm{{KI}}$ 溶液中,产物是什么? 已知元素电势图如下:

${E}_{\mathrm{A}}^{ \ominus }/\mathrm{V}\;{\mathrm{H}}_{5}{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{6}\xrightarrow[]{1.70}{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{3}^{ - }\xrightarrow[]{1.14}\mathrm{{HOI}}\xrightarrow[]{1.45}{\mathrm{I}}_{3}^{ - }\xrightarrow[]{0.54}{\mathrm{I}}^{ - }$

$$
{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - }\xrightarrow[]{0.56}{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{2 - }\xrightarrow[]{2.26}{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2}\xrightarrow[]{0.95}{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{3 + }\xrightarrow[]{1.51}{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + }\xrightarrow[]{-{1.18}}\mathrm{{Mn}}
$$
answer:
从元素电势图可知, $\mathrm{{HIO}},{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{2 - },{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{3 + }$ 能发生歧化反应,在酸性介质中不能稳定存在, 这些物质不可能是反应产物。

在酸性介质中,单质 $\mathrm{{Mn}}$ 能与 ${\mathrm{H}}^{ + }$ 反应,因而 $\mathrm{{Mn}}$ 不是反应产物。

题中给出的 $\mathrm{{KI}}$ 溶液过量,因此,凡能与 ${\mathrm{I}}^{ - }$ 发生反应的物质也不能是反应产物,应予以排除,则反应产物不能是 ${\mathrm{{IO}}}_{3}^{ - },{\mathrm{H}}_{5}{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{6}$ 和 ${\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2}$ :

$$
3{\mathrm{H}}_{5}{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{6} + {\mathrm{I}}^{ - } = 4{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{3}^{ - } + 3{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } + 6{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}
$$

$$
3{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{2} + {\mathrm{I}}^{ - } + 6{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } = {\mathrm{{IO}}}_{3}^{ - } + 3{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + 3{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}
$$

$$
{\mathrm{{IO}}}_{3}^{ - } + 5{\mathrm{I}}^{ - } + 6{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } = 3{\mathrm{I}}_{2} + 3{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}
$$

从以上分析结果看,反应产物只能是 ${\mathrm{I}}_{3}^{ - }$ 和 ${\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + }$ :

$$
2{\mathrm{{MnO}}}_{4}^{ - } + {15}{\mathrm{I}}^{ - } + {16}{\mathrm{H}}^{ + } = 5{\mathrm{I}}_{3}^{ - } + 2{\mathrm{{Mn}}}^{2 + } + 8{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}
$$

question: 向酸性的 ${1.0} \times {10}^{-3}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }$ 溶液中加入过量液态汞,发生反应: $2{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + } + 2\mathrm{{Hg}} =$ $2{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + } + {\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }$ ,达平衡时溶液中还有 ${4.6}\% {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }$ 。已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }}\right) = {0.771}\mathrm{\;V}$ ,求 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Hg}}}\right)$ 。
answer:
达平衡时, 各离子的浓度为

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }\right) = {1.0} \times {10}^{-3}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3} \times {4.6}\% = {4.60} \times {10}^{-5}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }\right) = {1.0} \times {10}^{-3}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3} - {4.6} \times {10}^{-5}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3} = {9.54} \times {10}^{-4}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

$$
c\left( {\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }\right) = \frac{1}{2}c\left( {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }\right) = {4.77} \times {10}^{-4}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}
$$

平衡常数为

$$
{K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{c\left( {\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }\right) {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}}{{\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}} = \frac{{4.77} \times {10}^{-4} \times {\left( {9.54} \times {10}^{-4}\right) }^{2}}{{\left( {4.6} \times {10}^{-5}\right) }^{2}} = {0.205}
$$

电池的电动势为

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {K}^{ \ominus } = \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {0.205} = - {0.020}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

由 ${E}^{ \ominus } = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Hg}}}\right)$ 得

$$
{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Hg}}}_{2}^{2 + }/\mathrm{{Hg}}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{3 + }/{\mathrm{{Fe}}}^{2 + }}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }
$$

$$
= {0.771}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.02}\mathrm{\;V}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.79}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

question:
已知 ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{O}}_{2}/{\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }}\right) = {0.401}\mathrm{\;V},{E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{H}}^{ + }/{\mathrm{H}}_{2}}\right) = 0;\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}}\right\rbrack -$ 的 ${K}_{\text{稳 }}^{ \ominus } = 1 \times {10}^{21},{K}_{\mathrm{a}}^{ \ominus }\left( \mathrm{{HCN}}\right) = {1.0} \times {10}^{-{10}}$ 。通过计算回答:

（1）在碱性条件下通入空气时, $\mathrm{{Ag}}$ 能否溶于 $\mathrm{{KCN}}$ 溶液?

(2) $\mathrm{{Ag}}$ 能否从 $\mathrm{{KCN}}$ 溶液中置换出 ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}$ ?
answer:
(1) ${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) + {0.059}\lg c\left( {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\right)$

${\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + } + 2{\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - } = {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }$

当 $c\left( {\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - }\right) = c\left( {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }\right) = 1\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$ 时

${K}_{\text{稳 }}^{ \ominus } = \frac{c\left( {\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }\right) }{c\left( {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\right) {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}} = \frac{1}{c\left( {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\right) }$

即 $c\left( {\mathrm{{Ag}}}^{ + }\right) = \frac{1}{{K}_{\text{稳 }}^{ \ominus }}$

${E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right) = {0.80}\mathrm{\;V} + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg \frac{1}{1 \times {10}^{21}} = - {0.44}\mathrm{\;V}$

对反应 $4\mathrm{{Ag}} + {\mathrm{O}}_{2} + 8\mathrm{{KCN}} + 2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} = 4\mathrm{\;K}\left\lbrack {\mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}}\right\rbrack + 4\mathrm{{KOH}}$

$$
{E}^{ \ominus } = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{O}}_{2}/{\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right)
$$

$$
= {0.401}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.44}\mathrm{\;V}}\right) = {0.84}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

说明在碱性条件下通入空气时, $\mathrm{{Ag}}$ 能溶于 $\mathrm{{KCN}}$ 溶液。

（2）在 $\mathrm{{KCN}}$ 溶液中,由于 ${\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - }$ 的水解,溶液呈弱碱性, $c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \approx {10}^{-{12}}\mathrm{\;{mol}} \cdot {\mathrm{{dm}}}^{-3}$

对反应 $2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} + 2{\mathrm{e}}^{ - } = {\mathrm{H}}_{2} + 2{\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }$

$$
E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}/{\mathrm{H}}_{2}}\right) = {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\mathrm{H}}^{ + }/{\mathrm{H}}_{2}}\right) + \frac{{0.059}\mathrm{\;V}}{2}\lg {\left\lbrack c\left( {\mathrm{H}}^{ + }\right) \right\rbrack }^{2}
$$

$$
= 0\mathrm{\;V} + {0.059}\mathrm{\;V}\lg {10}^{-{12}}
$$

$$
= - {0.71}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

对反应 $2\mathrm{{Ag}} + 2{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O} + 4{\mathrm{{CN}}}^{ - } = 2{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - } + {\mathrm{H}}_{2} + 2{\mathrm{{OH}}}^{ - }$

$$
E = E\left( {{\mathrm{H}}_{2}\mathrm{O}/{\mathrm{H}}_{2}}\right) - {E}^{ \ominus }\left( {{\left\lbrack \mathrm{{Ag}}{\left( \mathrm{{CN}}\right) }_{2}\right\rbrack }^{ - }/\mathrm{{Ag}}}\right)
$$

$$
= - {0.71}\mathrm{\;V} - \left( {-{0.44}\mathrm{\;V}}\right)
$$

$$
= - {0.27}\mathrm{\;V}
$$

$E < 0$ ,故 $\mathrm{{Ag}}$ 不能从 $\mathrm{{KCN}}$ 溶液中置换出 ${\mathrm{H}}_{2}$ 。
